name: Fantasy Games
overview: The second coup of the newcomers from Silverbyte. light up next to you, then press the switch... ... here it looks rather gloomy. Up to ten participants can play in three disciplines : First of all there is the egg game, here two barbarians are supposed to break open a giant egg at the same time and under time pressure and then slurp it up, where the best joystick shaker wins. Well then, cheers to the feast! The 3D flight sequence on a winged dinosaur, where you can throw balloons with your helmet. Lastly, as a diver, collecting pearls from the seabed and avoiding fish is almost ingenious in comparison. experience points distributed in battle (for free assignment to the various properties of the character) hardly reveal any far-reaching effects. It is particularly puzzling why you can then save those, of all things, but not best times or tables! Enjoy the fine scrolling, the beautiful animations, the brisk music and the useful controls.
